label: Review Green Procurement Compilation Guidance
quote: The Contractor should review the GPC when determining which statutory purchasing programs apply to a specific product or service.

label: Security Protections for Controlled Unclassified Information
quote: Adequate Security means security protections commensurate with the risk resulting from the unauthorized access, use, disclosure, disruption, modification, or destruction of information.
section: HSAR 3052.204-72 Safeguarding of controlled unclassified information

label: Confidentiality, Integrity, and Availability Protections for Information Systems
quote: This includes ensuring that information hosted on behalf of an agency and information systems and applications used by the agency operate effectively and provide appropriate confidentiality, integrity, and availability protections through the application of cost-effective security controls.
section: HSAR 3052.204-72 Safeguarding of controlled unclassified information
